abstract: State University of New York announces retirement of Chancellor Nancy L Zimpher in 2017; credited with promoting university and improving its academics, Zimpher says she intends to remain active in various education initiatives.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Zimpher, who became chancellor of New York State’s public university system seven years ago, has relentlessly promoted it as an engine of economic growth and community development.

headline.main: Nancy Zimpher to Resign as SUNY Chancellor in 2017
headline.print_headline: Chancellor at SUNY, and Its Top Promoter, Will Resign in ’17

snippet: Dr. Zimpher, who became chancellor of New York State’s public university system seven years ago, has relentlessly promoted it as an engine of economic growth and community development.
